data.comment: The first-half is under way at Stadio Artemio Franchi - Fiorentina kick-off to start the match.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Erick Pulgar of Fiorentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 6, Free kick Genoa.
Throw-in Genoa.
Can Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 9, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina drive forward but Dusan Vlahovic is judged offside.
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 15, Fiorentina's Erick Pulgar has been booked in Florence.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Stefano Sturaro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Genoa.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Daniele Doveri awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Genoa.
Dusan Vlahovic (Fiorentina) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 22, Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Genoa in the half of Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Daniele Doveri awards the away team a throw-in.
Daniele Doveri signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Genoa's half.
Fiorentina's Franck Ribery breaks free at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Genoa surge into the attack at Stadio Artemio Franchi but Gianluca Scamacca’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
Attention is being given to Genoa’s Cristian Zapata and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 35, Erick Pulgar (Fiorentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Daniele Doveri signals a throw-in for Genoa, close to Fiorentina's area.
Cristian Zapata for Genoa is back on the field again.
In the minute 36, Can Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Daniele Doveri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Paolo Ghiglione (Genoa) has replaced the possibly injured Cristian Zapata at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Fiorentina.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Dusan Vlahovic's header is off-target for Fiorentina.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
The home team replace Gaetano Castrovilli with Giacomo Bonaventura.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Fiorentina's Franck Ribery gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Genoa have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Eldor Shomurodov for Genoa is whistled offside.
Gianluca Scamacca (Genoa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Stefano Sturaro for Genoa has been booked by Daniele Doveri and receives a first yellow card.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Genoa kick-off.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Free kick Fiorentina.
Fiorentina attack but German Pezzella's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 47, It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Fiorentina are pushing forward but Dusan Vlahovic's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
In the minute 49, Genoa to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In Florence, Giacomo Bonaventura (Fiorentina) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 52, Daniele Doveri awards Genoa a goal kick.
Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Daniele Doveri signals a Genoa throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in high up the field for Genoa in Florence.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Florence to check on Federico Marchetti, who is grimacing with pain.
Federico Marchetti is back on his feet again.
In the minute 63, Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 65, The away team has substituted Federico Marchetti with Alberto Paleari. Rolando Maran is thus making his second change.
The away team have replaced Eldor Shomurodov with Marko Pjaca. This is the third substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Fiorentina push forward at Stadio Artemio Franchi and Dusan Vlahovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Genoa defence.
Daniele Doveri signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Genoa's area.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 69, Fiorentina are coming forward and Dusan Vlahovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Genoa have a goal kick.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 73, Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Luca Pellegrini (Genoa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Daniele Doveri signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 75, In Florence Fiorentina attack through Dusan Vlahovic. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Fiorentina's Sofyan Amrabat is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Fiorentina.
Patrick Cutrone is replacing Dusan Vlahovic for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Fiorentina make their third substitution with Borja Valero replacing Franck Ribery.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 79, Claudio Cesare Prandelli (Fiorentina) is making a fourth substitution, with Valentin Eysseric replacing Jose Callejon.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
Mattia Destro is on a sub for Gianluca Scamacca for Genoa.
In the minute 80, Valon Behrami is replacing Ivan Radovanovic for the away team.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Genoa.
In Florence, German Pezzella of Fiorentina is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In the minute 86, Fiorentina pushes forward through Cristiano Biraghi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Genoa.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Genoa's Mattia Destro is whistled for offside at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Marko Pjaca.
In the minute 89, Mattia Destro instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Florence.
Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Daniele Doveri signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Genoa's half.
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Genoa drives forward and Mattia Destro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fiorentina are in shooting range from this free kick.
Fiorentina's Valentin Eysseric gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Fiorentina make their fifth substitution with Christian Kouame replacing Erick Pulgar.
Borja Valero (Fiorentina) has received a first yellow card.
Nikola Milenkovic levels the score at 1-1.
